high.mackenzie.autumn.lang.compiler.typesystem

Class AbstractInvokableMember

  • java.lang.Object
    • high.mackenzie.autumn.lang.compiler.typesystem.AbstractMember
      • high.mackenzie.autumn.lang.compiler.typesystem.AbstractInvokableMember
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IAnnotatable, IInvokableMember, IMember
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReflectiveConstructor, ReflectiveMethod

    public abstract class AbstractInvokableMember
extends AbstractMember
implements IInvokableMember
    This class provides a partial implementation of the IInvokableMember interface.

    • Method Detail

      • getDescriptor

        public java.lang.String getDescriptor()
        This method computes and returns the method's descriptor.
        Specified by:
        getDescriptor in interface IInvokableMember
        Returns:
        getParameterListDescriptor() + getReturnType().getDescriptor()

      • getParameterListDescriptor

        public java.lang.String getParameterListDescriptor()
        This method computes and returns the descriptor of the method's formal parameter-list.

        The returned string is simply an opening-parenthesis followed by the type-descriptor of each of the method's formal-parameters followed by a closing-parenthesis. The descriptor of a formal parameter is the type-descriptor of the formal-parameter's type.

        Specified by:
        getParameterListDescriptor in interface IInvokableMember
        Returns:
        the descriptor of the method's formal parameter-list.

      • getNamePlusDescriptor

        public java.lang.String getNamePlusDescriptor()

        Specified by:
        getNamePlusDescriptor in interface IInvokableMember
        Returns:
        getName() + getDescriptor()

      • getNamePlusParameterListDescriptor

        public java.lang.String getNamePlusParameterListDescriptor()
